title: an artifact discoverability fix: generate /outputs/ARTIFACT_INDEX.md (or JSON) that lists all required deliverables and their resolved absolute/relative paths, and update PROJECT_TRACKER.json to point to the real, existing artifacts (audit shows artifacts scattered across code-creation/... and runtime/outputs/... and QA skipped due to non-discovery).
mission: Create an artifact discoverability fix: generate /outputs/ARTIFACT_INDEX.md (or JSON) that lists all required deliverables and their resolved absolute/relative paths, and update PROJECT_TRACKER.json to point to the real, existing artifacts (audit shows artifacts scattered across code-creation/... and runtime/outputs/... and QA skipped due to non-discovery).
